reviewText: Perfect for the Stevie Wonder fan.

I actually thought this was a Dvd. However, it did contain an extra Cd with several of my very important all time Wonder classics. Like Sir Duke, Sir Stevland Morris enthralls listeners with music from the heart that reaches the depths of ones soul. It leaves you desiring to to love more, to live more positively and to give more. A Time To Love will help the world to recognize that the time to share love unconditionally is now. To top that Sir Stevland gives us a Bonus, as a reminder of his never ending love. It is beyond me how I allowed this Masterful Treasure to sit on a shelf for so long before adding it to my collection.
